<title level="1" right="Trait">[Oath](/Traits.aspx?ID=119)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 109 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Oaths add an additional tenet to your code. You can usually have only one feat with this trait.
name: Oath
